comment.body: i'm sure the trolls will be here in due time...
@Rythyrix: that works pretty good here in ZeroMe, it will be more of a challenge for some of the sites with discussion threads and chat...will require moderation as always....
this is nice.....  are there currently any ways to view ipfs content via http in a normal browser?

@Styromaniac: ok i see, browser extension.  just wondered if anyone had built something so normal browsers without any add-ons could access ipfs content ... seems like firefox will be the first to support ipfs natively..
